hours_text:
##  Plan Your Visit 

**Mon-Wed:** Closed  
**Thu-Sun:** 11am ‒ 5pm

**monca**  
900 Esplanade  
Chico, CA 95926

[ Get Directions ](https://maps.app.goo.gl/mMZuH4fLRuYZnUD89)[ Contact Us  ](/pages/contact)

Monca

##  A Showcase of California Art 

**monca** is a vehicle for Northern California artists and the community. We create art for the sake of enjoyment, expression, social cohesion, innovation and communication. We create vital educational programs that inspire enthusiasm and increase the quality of life for artists, art enthusiasts and the public.

[ Exhibitions ](/blogs/exhibitions)[ Upcoming Events ](/pages/events)

Visiting Monca

##  Frequently Asked Questions 

###  Parking 

Street parking is available on E. Washington and Esplanade, directly in front and on the side of the building. Other parking can be found on Oleander Street.

**Please do not park where there are “Residential Only” parking signs**. We love our neighbors and we want them to love us!

On busy days parking is available a block and half down at First Christian Church Chico, 295 E. Washington Ave.

###  Ways to Support 

Donations, attending events, and even following us is a great way to support us. All donations are tax deductible, secure, and produce a receipt for tax purposes. [Donate](/pages/donate "Donate")

###  Memberships 

Members of **monca** get exclusive benefits and easy access to all of our events. We have a variety of memberships available for individuals, families and businesses...
